components: ENGINE AND ENGINE COOLING,FUEL SYSTEM, OTHER,INTERIOR LIGHTING
summary: WHILE DRIVING, CONSUMER ATTEMPTED TO MAKE TURNS AND STEERING WAS VERY HARD.  CONSUMER VISUALLY NOTICED A FLUID LEAKING FROM UNDER VEHICLE.  DEALER DIAGNOSED THAT THE POWER STEERING PUMP HAD FAILED. TS  THE NEXT DAY, CONSUMER NOTICED MORE FLUID LEAKING.  DEALER REPLACED CRANKSHAFT AND KEYWAY.  DOME LIT INOPERATIVE.  BULB REPLACED.  CHECK ENGINE LIGHT WAS ON.  DEALER FOUND EVAPORATIVE SYSTEM MALFUNCTIONED.   *TT
